summary: Add some Harry Potter Spell to the Game
descriptionHtml:
[b][b][u][b][u][size=5][color=#ff0000]Harry Potter Spell[/color][/size][/u][/b][/u][/b][size=3]
[/size]
[color=#6aa84f]
[/color]
[i][u][color=#ffff00]I AM NOT SURE OF THE REQUIREMENT FOR NOT I WOULD SUGGEST TO HAVE AT LEAST DRAGONBORN AND DAWNGUARD I AM NOT SUR FOR NOW[/color][/u][/i]
[color=#6aa84f]
[/color][list=1]
[*][color=#6aa84f] Avada kedavra   - Insta Kill[/color]
[*][color=#6aa84f] Impero        - Control enemy (Need some fix)[/color]
[*][color=#6aa84f] Protego      -Very powerfull ward (Need to block arrow and weapons hit)[/color]
[*][color=#6aa84f] Alohomora          - Unlock any doors or chest[/color]
[*][color=#6aa84f] Accio     - Attract a Item to you[/color]
[*][color=#6aa84f] Depulso         - Expulse a Item away from you[/color]
[*] [color=#6aa84f]Lumos          - a light directly in your hand ![/color]
[*] [color=#6aa84f]Lumos Maxima     - Cast a ball of light [/color]
[*] [color=#6aa84f]Stupefy                 - Stun Your enemy[/color]
[*] [color=#6aa84f]Expecto Patronum        - Spawn a ghostly Wolf that push away you enemy[/color]
[*] [color=#6aa84f]Oblivite   - make the target forget about the past event ![/color]
[*] [color=#6aa84f]Finite incantatem         - Disable any active disease[/color]
[*] [color=#6aa84f]Disillution Charms        - Be invisible (Cast again to be Visible again)[/color]
[*] [color=#6aa84f]Feather Light Charm    - Add 100 Carryweight for 5 Minute[/color]
[*] [color=#6aa84f]Homenum Revelio        - Show any npc nearby [/color]
[*] [color=#6aa84f]Point Me      -Show the path of the current Goal[/color]
[/list]

[color=#6aa84f]For now this is the available spell you will need to add it with the console
but in the next update i will fix this so here a you add the spell[/color]

[color=#ff7700]1. Help ''Name of the spell'' (without the quote)
2. find the code of the spell Exemple ''Avada kedvra CD005903"
3. Type ''player.addspell "the Spell code" (with out the quote) exemple -> player.addspell cd005903
4.Equippe the spell 
5. Enjoy :D
[/color][/b]
author: momo1o3
